name: country-codes
title: Comprehensive country codes: ISO 3166, ITU, ISO 4217 currency codes and many more

sources.name: United Nations Protocol and Liaison Service
Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) Project
United Nations Department of Ecoonomic and Social Affairs Statistics Division
SIX Interbank Clearing Ltd (on behalf of ISO)

fields.name: CLDR display name
fields.description: Country's customary English short name (CLDR)

fields.name: official_name_en
fields.description: Country or Area official English short name from UN Statistics Divsion

fields.description: Country or Area official Spanish short name from UN Statistics Divsion

fields.name: official_name_ru
fields.description: Country or Area official Russian short name from UN Statistics Divsion

fields.name: ISO3166-1-Alpha-2
fields.description: Alpha-2 codes from ISO 3166-1

fields.name: ISO3166-1-Alpha-3
fields.description: Alpha-3 codes from ISO 3166-1 (synonymous with World Bank Codes)

fields.name: M49
fields.description: UN Statistics M49 numeric codes (nearly synonymous with ISO 3166-1 numeric codes, which are based on UN M49. ISO 3166-1 does not include Channel Islands or Sark, for example)

fields.name: ITU
fields.description: Codes assigned by the International Telecommunications Union

fields.name: MARC
fields.description: MAchine-Readable Cataloging codes from the Library of Congress

fields.name: WMO
fields.description: Country abbreviations by the World Meteorological Organization

fields.name: DS
fields.description: Distinguishing signs of vehicles in international traffic

fields.name: Dial
fields.description: Country code from ITU-T recommendation E.164, sometimes followed by area code

fields.name: FIFA
fields.description: Codes assigned by the Fédération Internationale de Football Association

fields.name: FIPS
fields.description: Codes from the U.S. standard FIPS PUB 10-4

fields.name: GAUL
fields.description: Global Administrative Unit Layers from the Food and Agriculture Organization

fields.name: IOC
fields.description: Codes assigned by the International Olympics Committee

fields.name: ISO4217-currency_alphabetic_code
fields.description: ISO 4217 currency alphabetic code

fields.name: ISO4217-currency_country_name
fields.description: ISO 4217 country name

fields.name: ISO4217-currency_minor_unit
fields.description: ISO 4217 currency number of minor units

fields.name: ISO4217-currency_name
fields.description: ISO 4217 currency name

fields.name: ISO4217-currency_numeric_code
fields.description: ISO 4217 currency numeric code
